sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The experiment was approved by the Norwegian Food Safety Authority, FOTS (case number: 7262) and was conducted in accordance with the European Convention for the protection of vertebrate animals ( http://conventions.coe.int/treaty/en/treaties/html/123.htm) used for experimental and other scientific purposes.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
